channel.title: Whats the best type of client to use for a webclient?
channel.description: Hi, I just broke up with my girlfriend so I need something to do to keep me from killing myself. Does anyone know the best type of client to use to make a webclient? Everytime I try and build one with bluurr it always gets messed up because of the way its writen.

item.title: Whats the best type of client to use for a webclient?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

Just use a client with very few custom sprites and it should be really easy to make a webclient.

Read full topic
item.source: Whats the best type of client to use for a webclient?
